title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table and displaying them in a dynamic text item or a data/text item, the format of the datetime values is different.
OB: The datetime values displayed in the dynamic text item and data/text item are in different formats.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a text, data, or dynamic text item in a table.
2. Retrieve datetime values from the table and display them in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
3. Compare the format of the datetime values in both items and observe the inconsistency.
